sys_ux_client_script.name: Open Record With Crometab (custom)

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_465c65719318da903a7efca97bba10d0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="デフォルト">e945b2ba1bc416103de3fdd2cd4bcbac</macroponent><name>Open Record With Crometab (custom)</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    helpers,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        routeMapping,
        buildDefaultRoutePayload
    } = imports["global.recordRoutesMapping"]();

    var route = 'inq-default-record';
    var targetRoute = '';
    const defaultRoutePayload = buildDefaultRoutePayload(route, targetRoute, event);

    const routeMap = api.data.dynamic_routing_simplelist.routeMap;
    const payload = routeMapping(routeMap, defaultRoutePayload, event);

    // If a table name passed into trueupTable matches the existing table
    // refresh trueup DR to get real table name; otherwise use existing.
    if(api.state.routeParentTables && api.state.routeParentTables.split(',').find(table => table === payload.fields.table)) {
        api.setState('navigationPayload', payload); 
        api.data.resolve_route_parent_tables.refresh(); 
    } else { 
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', payload); 
    } 
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>akamatsu.shota@blueship.co.jp</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-29 05:50:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>465c65719318da903a7efca97bba10d0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Open Record With Crometab (custom)</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CCテンプレート" source="x_bllt_bs_cc">ff092a9b1bbf86106e132f092a4bcb30</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CCテンプレート">ff092a9b1bbf86106e132f092a4bcb30</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_465c65719318da903a7efca97bba10d0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>akamatsu.shota@blueship.co.jp</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-29 05:50:13</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
